title: Put large content in text item, the tips shows the content in one line
description: When putting large content in a text item, the tips for the item should show the content in the given format. Currently, the tips are displayed in one line.
OB: When putting large content in a text item, the tips for the item show the content in one line instead of the expected format. The content appears to be truncated.
EB: When putting large content in a text item, the tips for the item should display the content in the given format without truncation. The content should be displayed in the expected format.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Go to a page with a text item.
3. Enter a large amount of text in the text item.
4. Observe the tips that appear for the text item.
